title: Van Morrison - Avalon Sunset (1989) [FLAC] (Rem & Exp 24 Bit 96
description:
Van Morrison - Avalon Sunset (1989) [FLAC] (Rem & Exp 24 Bit 96 K 2008)

Artist................Van Morrison
Album-Titel...........Avalon Sunset 
Genre.................Rock
Street Date...........1989 (Rem & Exp 24 Bit 96 K 2008) 
Recording Type........Studio 

VAN MORRISON - AVALON SUNSET (24 BIT 96 KhZ REMASTER & EXPANDED)
In the beginning of 2008, many of Van's albums were released again, 
newly remastered and with bonus tracks. 
Avalon Sunset vas originally released in 1989. 
This contains 2 unreleased bonus tracks. All the 
new releases has been remastered at 96 kHz 24 bit 
and they sound very fine.
Avalon Sunset is one of my favorite albums with Van, 
from his great period. I think he's at his best in the 
70's and 80's. The 90's and 00's is not so good. What I like 
so much is the contemplative and relaxing sound on those albums

Tracks:

1. Whenever God Shines His Light
Solist/Artist:Richard Cliff    
2. Contacting My Angel    
3. I'd Love To Write Another Song    
4. Have I Told You Lately    
5. Coney Island    
6. I'm Tired Joey Boy    
7. When Will I Ever Learn To Live In    
8. Orangefield    
9. Daring Night    
10. These Are The Days    
11. Whenever God Shines His Light (Alternate Take)    
12. When The Saints Go Marching In (Prev unreleased)
